turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How are you doing today? Today, I need your help ordering some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I'm going to be ordering from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what are the toppings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The other two are going to be the same, so after you are going to add the same toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are they all thin crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They are all concretious.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 3 large thin crust chicken bbq and mushroom pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $55.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. 55, that's a pretty good price right there. Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. 30 minutes is good timing for me. Cool.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: nice. enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. No. No. Thank you for helping me order these pizzas today. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye-bye.
